heading: Minion Barbarian Endgame Build Guide
content: Welcome to the Minion Barbarian Build Guide! This is a brand new archetype in Season 8, made possible thanks to some changes on how is categorized; most importantly, it gained the Summon tag, but also got newfound synergy with . That's right, procs from this item now benefit from Summon and Ultimate damage, as well as all of their related multipliers! This technically gives us a few options. The Ancients summoned from consist of three members: While all of these are technically viable sources of damage, for the purpose of this guide, we are focusing on Earthquakes primarily, with Twisters as our secondary focus.
